content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maria Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for considering my apartment for rental, Maria. I am happy to discuss the rental price with you. Could you please tell me your budget and what you are looking for in terms of a monthly rental?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am looking for the lowest possible price. I want to be on good terms with the landlord. I am a student and I want to be responsible for my rent. I appreciate your understanding.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Understood, Maria. As a landlord, I want to ensure that the rental price is fair and reflects the value of the apartment. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I would like to propose a rental price of 900 Euros per month. This price takes into account the current market rates and would allow me to continue to invest in the property while also providing you with a comfortable living space.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 900 Euros per month. Thank you for your understanding and for considering my request.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: You're welcome, Maria. I am glad that we were able to come to an agreement on the rental price. If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to reach out to me. I look forward to having you as a tenant in my apartment.
name: Heinrich Heine
